page.title: 03BYFIELD VILLAGE HALL
page.content: THE VILLAGE HALL IS USED FOR ALL SORTS OF EVENTS AND THEY ARE NOT JUST FOR THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN BYFIELD.SOMETIMES EVENTS ARE HELD ON THE SAME DAY EVERY WEEK THESE ARE,WEDNESDAY-DANCING, FRIDAY-BINGO.THE HALL IS ALSO USED FOR THE PANTOMIMES,SCHOOL PLAYS AND P.T.A. EVENTS,AND CAN BE HIRED FOR A DISCO, PARTY,ETC.THE VILLAGE HALL HAS 9 DIFFERENT ROOMS.THERE IS A POWDER ROOM WHICH IS USED FOR MAKE-UP.THERE IS ALSO A CORRIDOR AND 2 TOILETS.THERE IS ALSO A KITCHEN AND AN EXTRA ROOM FOR SERVING DRINKS, AND A DRESSING ROOM.THEN THERE IS THE MAIN HALL WITH A STAGE AND AN ANNEXE.THE HALL IS USED BY ALL THE PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE.SOMETIMES WEDDING RECEPTIONS ARE HELD THERE IF THERE IS SOMEONE GETTING MARRIED IN THE CHURCH.
